metadata.title: CVE-2017-5356 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Irssi before 0.8.21 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read and crash) via a string containing a formattingsequence (%[) without a closing bracket (]).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5356` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3').
